title: Fundamentals of Linux: Unix Scripts For Text Manipulation
description:
The goal of this course is to present the most common Unix
text manipulation commands

steps.title: Step 1: Set-up - learn how to use more, less and cat command
Step 2: learn how to use wc and grep commands
Step 3: learn how to use head, tail and sed commands
Step 4: learn how to use tr, sort and uniq commands
Step 5: learn how to use join, awk paste commands
